ygData.subject: RE: Fed up with EQ - any ideas??
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree with you on AC.. I m part beta program, however i rarely play it now.. its neat when you first start playing.. then you find out that the game
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree with you on AC.. I'm part beta program, however i rarely
play it now.. its neat when you first start playing.. then you find out that
the game just sucks.. :) cant put it any other way. Graphics are ok.. but
the world is so large and the distance between them is almost unbearable.
Its really annoying running for what seems forever, then losing your best
item you spent all your loot on miles from where you last bound yourself.
Hehe.. The AC world is so empty, almost as empty as their dungeons. :)

For those that don't know.. when you die in AC you temporary lose some of
your stat numbers and.. your best item. This item.. which is now
available to anyone walking by. nice aye. EQ example... One minute you
have your rubi tunic, when you return to your corpse you find that a level 1
guy is now sporting your hard earned tunic.. Welcome to AC. hehe



-----Original Message-----
From: Shane Bole [mailto:shane0009@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 2:57 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com; kaleusi@...
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Fed up with EQ - any ideas??


From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>

AC and UO both suck ass. You should have tried ac last week during open
beta. I logged in and ran around for a while.. It seemed ok but all the
things I thought that were nice about it later on sucked
its annoying as hell plus the graphics suck, monster AI is sucky so you can
solo your whole way to the top without getting hurt for 1 point of damage

Fammuin, level 16 Erudite Cleric, Erollisi Marr
Fabno Licious <Warriors of Apocalypse>, level 22 Erudite Enchanter, Erollisi
Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: kale eusi <kaleusi@...>
To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 12:04 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] Fed up with EQ - any ideas??


> From: "kale eusi" <kaleusi@...>
>
> I'm rather fed up with Verant! They're constantly nerfing everything
ingame
> that's worth while, or ignoring classes that need to be balanced or
> upgraded! So in retrospect, I'm looking to find greener pastures
elsewhere.
> Perhaps someone out there knows of another game (other than AC and UO) or
> perhaps a group who's programming their own game similar to EQ? If so,
> please don't hesistate to drop me a line or two via email. Tks in advance!
>
> > Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
>

Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
